name: The Costal Treasure Hunt
description:
Made for the Interstellar Game Jam 4. This is the second time I've submitted for a game jam. This is a more down-to-Earth adventure...relatively speaking.

Special thanks to the people that helped me with voice acting and a few other things here and there. They are my friends and they're all awesome!
ExodiasLeftNipple
LadyFoxHeart
TheNerdChef
